Title: Looking for Something Specific
Description:
<Ragged John blinks blearily up at you.> 

So ye took down that ol' worg, didye? Well aren't ye the biggest strongest human I seen since ol' Windsor. 

<Ragged John sighs.>

...Well? What're ye still doing here? Go take what ye found to whoever sent ye here in the first place!
ObjectivesText: Return to Shaw in the basement of the Lion's Pride Inn.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Shaw in the basement of the Lion's Pride Inn in Goldshire.
